attributes.action: My ISP provider droped his price to £20.00 for 1 year.After i complained i was paying more than a new Joiner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My 10MB internet connection has droped to just over 1 to just over 2MB,after they reduced the price of my broadband from £25.00 to £ 20.00.Just before i was getting 9987 ro 9989 Kbs a sec thats almost 10 Mb,now iether they have a problem yet again with there servers,or i am being targeted.This sort of thing should be investigated by Oftel.

rejection.details: Unfortunately, e-petitions are intended for comment on government policy, and cannot address individual cases. In this instance, you may wish to contact your ISP and Oftel directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
